BBVADOLA.MX.short_name: BBVA BANCOMER GESTION SA FDO BB
BBVADOLA.MX.long_name: Fondo BBVA Bancomer Deuda DÃ³lares SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
BBVADOLA.MX.summary: The objective is to provide investors BBVADOL coverage of the Mexican peso against the dollar, in a portfolio comprising debt investment assets denominated mainly in dollars through bank deposits of money to look at financial institutions, including foreign and securities issued or guaranteed by the Federal Government, the Bank of Mexico, state and municipal governments, and corporate credit institutions, domestic and foreign, live or repo. The Fund also may invest in financial derivative instruments recognized market under the provisions issued by the CNBV and Banco de Mexico, denominated in local currency and / or foreign. The Fund will have a short-term investment strategy, seeking to capitalize on market movements.
BBVADOLA.MX.family: BBVA Bancomer GestiÃ³n SA de CV

INVEXCOA.MX.short_name: Zcob SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
INVEXCOA.MX.long_name: Zcob SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
INVEXCOA.MX.summary: Providing the individual investor, moral and not moral subject to withholding, the option of investing its funds mainly in instruments denominated in dollars of the United States of America, through money bank deposits, government debt securities, private banking and other financial assets of the same nature, that provide consistent returns to an investment strategy of short-term and in turn hedge against changes in the exchange rate of the Mexican peso against the U.S. dollar.

VECTCOBA.MX.short_name: VECTOR FONDOS SA DE CV VECTOR F
VECTCOBA.MX.long_name: Vector Fondo COB, S.A. de C.V. F.I.I.D. A
VECTCOBA.MX.summary: The Fund seeks to provide investors an investment alternative allowing them to optimize their resources in terms of the exchange rate relationship between the Mexican peso and dollars. The Fund Portfolio is mainly conform to debt securities denominated in U.S. dollars and deposits of money to financial institutions including in the outside view, denominated in US dollars.
